# Operations on data frames


### Melt data frame in matrix form to long format

```{r echo=T}
library(reshape2)
df = as.data.frame(
      cbind(
            c(4,9,6)
           ,c(8,4,2)
           ,c(9,7,5)           
            ))
colnames(df) = c('Name1','Name2','Name3') 
rownames(df) = c('Name1','Name2','Name3') 
df
df = as.data.frame(melt(as.matrix(df)))
df
```
